description: Manages the overall analysis workflow, persists job states, and generates diverse documentation outputs based on the AI-driven analysis.

components.name: Workflow Orchestrator
components.description: Manages the end-to-end execution of the code analysis and documentation generation pipeline, coordinating various stages of the analysis from initiation to completion.

components.name: Job Persistence Manager
components.description: Provides mechanisms for storing, retrieving, and updating the state of analysis jobs, ensuring data durability and allowing for job resumption or historical tracking.

components.name: Documentation Generator
components.description: Transforms structured analysis results into various documentation formats, responsible for rendering outputs based on configuration and specific templates.
